name: Dark Lair
description:
Are you ready to deal with all of this ?

You wake up in an eerie old prison with mysteries yet to unravel. Solve puzzles, escape the winding dungeon, RUN from the unknown.

- Use headphones for the best experience
- Dark-creepy sounds
- Intricate puzzles
- Beware of traps all over the place
- Watch your back
- Look out for those eyes gazing at you in the dark . . .
